result.title: Disappointing procedure from this year APIO committee
result.content:
With over a week after the official contest and 3 days after the initial date of the official result, the committee still leaves us worrying about the result. This was meant no offense on anybody, I just want to express the common feeling of all the participants right now. I understand that because of the online format and multiple timezone time slots, there may be some serious problem with the scoring or appealing but I can't believe that they delay the result without any announcement even after 3 days. This makes us very confusing and longing for the result everyday. This is just my opinion, I was no meant to criticize anybody or organization, the contest was great, the server works perfectly and the problem was quite mind-bending. I just don't want such small details to ruin such wonderful contest.

UPD: APIO finally release its result ! Congrats to all medalist. I luckily got a silver.
